text: Ali Abdul Zahra (), (born 1 July 1953 in Basra) is a coach and former international Iraqi football player, who played with Iraq national football team in 1977 Pestabola Merdeka and scored a goal against Indonesia, he also played for Al-Minaa club.History of Iraqi Sports, 1977 (in Arabic) ==International goals== :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Ali Abdul Zahra
